author: Daisaku Ikeda
message: True happiness means forging a strong spirit that is undefeated, no matter how trying our circumstances.
title: Thought of the day

author: Peter Drucker
message: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
title: Thought of the day

author: Leonardo da Vinci
message: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Shakespeare
message: All the world is a stage, And all the men and women merely players.They have their exits and entrances; Each man in his time plays many parts.
title: Thought of the day
